snippet.title: Goldenheart - Pre-release announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Goldenheart is out now on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3002500/Goldenheart/

Face challenges and uncover secrets in an all new, all original 3D fantasy world. Experience a rich story from a first person point of view as you journey through the carefully imagined fantasy desert realm of Tuldenorrea, and perhaps even into realms beyond.
